title: 1 BIIIIG FK UP  with my client
body:
since yesterday i have been getting this everytime i launch my league and its really annoying it is on the new client

Failed to load URL "https://frontpage.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en_GB/lol/home/overview#protocol=https:&port=50448" with error "unknown error code -118" (-118)

replies.body:
Is this happening on the updated client only?  What happens on the legacy?

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

This can help determine if it's a network or client issue, or something else.  Let me know!

> for some reason its all fixed now but a lot of my friends having same issue , it all started with error connecting to server when login in on legacy and new client we couldnt log on for a while then eventually you can with that error but like i said mine is fixed now for some reason but my friends is having this issue now ,

on the new client it says unable to connect to the login queue. check the server status here. if it looks good follow the guide here.

on legacy client just say unable to connect try again

after a while you can connect but then in the client recieve this error i posted

Your network may be having problems connecting to the authentication servers, resulting in these errors.  Since the servers are the same, it won't matter which client you use in this case.  Instead, try out the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune up your network and get back in.  Hopefully that helps your specific issue!
my other friends on the same network as mine same room had no issues
i Cant login for over a week now did everything from check connections to making a ticket legacy doesnt work and only NA doesnt work but Oceania i can join

for some reason its all fixed now but a lot of my friends having same issue , it all started with error connecting to server when login in on legacy and new client we couldnt log on for a while then eventually you can with that error but like i said mine is fixed now for some reason but my friends is having this issue now ,

on the new client it says unable to connect to the login queue. check the server status here. if it looks good follow the guide here.

on legacy client just say unable to connect try again 

after a while you can connect but then in the client recieve this error i posted
